name: McQueen Cap
description:
Yupoong Flexfit Brushed 6-Panel Twill Front/Mesh Back Trucker Cap

Model: 6511

Cotton: 43%

Features:
*55% polyester, 43% cotton, 2% spandex
*3 ½” crown structured with hard buckram backing
*Two sewn eyelets
*Patented stretchable four polyester mesh spandex back and side       panels
*Solid front two panels and visor
*Silver underbill
*Poly weave spandex headband.
*Mid profile six panel

*Spandex sweatband retains shape

SIZES

name: Dirty Kremlin Cap (BLUE)
description:
DESCRIPTION
Premium Fitted 210
Pro-baseball on-field shape with flat visor, matching fabric sweatband, 210 taping on inside seams, hard buckram, 3 3/4" crown and moisture absorbent pro headband. Bottom stitched for durability, with matching color under-visor.

MATERIAL
83% Acrylic / 15% Wool/ 2% Spandex


SIZES
S/M FITTED (6 7/8" - 7 1/4") - L/XL FITTED (7 1/4" - 7 5/8")
